body_html:
dividing an Integer Tensor by an integer 0 (as opposed to Float Tensor divided by 0.0) will lead to this exception. This is not easily catchable (last I looked) at a global level.

See:

https://stackoverflow.com/a/3105604
https://stackoverflow.com/a/6121690

Closing this as wontfix, because the amount of effort is really large to justify (full audit of all core libraries and replacing all integer division with a macro that branch-handles divide by zero).

body:
dividing an Integer Tensor by an integer 0 (as opposed to Float Tensor divided by 0.0) will lead to this exception. This is not easily catchable (last I looked) at a global level.

See:

https://stackoverflow.com/a/3105604
https://stackoverflow.com/a/6121690

Closing this as `wontfix`, because the amount of effort is really large to justify (full audit of all core libraries and replacing all integer division with a macro that branch-handles divide by zero).
